name: Volleycano
description:
It's an intense Volleyball match in the heart of an active volcano!  Fire the ball into the lava on your opponent's side or destroy the floor on which they stand and watch them get roasted.  

Made for George Brown College's GBC Game Jam in July 2017.

Controls:

Player 01: A and D move you left and right, W to jump

Player 02: Left and Right Arrows move you left and right, Up Arrow to jump
